select id,resid,rescode,title,fromflag,time,content,imgpath,filesuffix from ( select t.id,t.assetid as resid,t.atime as time ,t.acontent as content,t.isscore as score,if(atype=0,2,1) as fromflag ,a.name as title,a.resourceid as rescode,a.assetpath as imgpath ,reverse(left(reverse(assetpath),locate('.',reverse(assetpath))-1)) as filesuffix from z_assetevaluate t left join z_asset a on a.id = t.assetid where t.atype in (0,2) and t.flag =false and a.flag =false and t.userid = #{userId} and t.IsScore =1
union all
select t.id,t.assetid as resid,t.atime as time ,t.acontent as content,t.isscore as score,0 as fromflag ,z.title,z.rescode,concat(z.fpath,'/',z.fname) as imgpath,reverse(left(reverse(fname),locate('.',reverse(fname))-1)) as filesuffix from z_assetevaluate t left join z_resource z on z.id = t.assetid where t.atype = 1 and t.flag =false and z.flag =false and t.userid = #{userId} and t.IsScore =1
union all
select t.id,t.assetid as resid,t.atime as time ,t.acontent as content,t.isscore as score,t.atype as fromflag ,r.title,r.rescode,r.fullpath as imgpath ,reverse(left(reverse(fname),locate('.',reverse(fname))-1)) as filesuffix from z_assetevaluate t left join z_districts_resource r on r.id = t.assetid where t.atype in(3,4) and t.flag =false and r.flag =false and t.userid = #{userId} and t.IsScore =1 )temp_tab where 1 =1 and content != '' and content is not null
and score in (4,5)
and score =3
and score in (1,2)
order by time desc
select count(1) as reviewNumber from z_assetevaluate t where t.flag = false and t.userid = #{userId}

select count(1) as unReviewNumber from ( select c.contId,c.contType ,CASE WHEN (contType=1 or contType=9) then 2 when (contType=2 or contType=10) then 1 WHEN contType=11 THEN 4 WHEN conttype =12 THEN 3 END as atype from j_lession_prepare p LEFT JOIN j_prepare_content c on c.preId = p.id where p.flag = false and p.userid = #{userId} and c.conttype in (2,10,11,12) )temp_t where NOT EXISTS ( select id from z_assetevaluate t where t.flag = false and t.userid = #{userId} and t.AssetId = temp_t.contId and t.Atype = temp_t.atype )

select contId,contType as unReviewNumber from ( select c.contId,c.contType ,CASE WHEN (contType=1 or contType=9) then 2 when (contType=2 or contType=10) then 1 WHEN contType=11 THEN 4 WHEN conttype =12 THEN 3 END as atype from j_lession_prepare p LEFT JOIN j_prepare_content c on c.preId = p.id where p.flag = false and p.userid = #{userId} and c.conttype in (2,10,11,12) )temp_t where NOT EXISTS ( select id from z_assetevaluate t where t.flag = false and t.userid = #{userId} and t.AssetId = temp_t.contId and t.Atype = temp_t.atype )
